code: import React,{useRef,useEffect}from"react";import{formater}from"./../../../../../../../utils/time/timeFromater";import{connect}from"react-redux";var TrackDuration=function TrackDuration(props){var container=useRef(null);useEffect(function(){if(typeof props.trackDuration==="string"){container.current.textContent=formater.ptToStr(props.trackDuration);}else{container.current.textContent=formater.secondsToStr(props.trackDuration);}},[container,props.trackDuration]);return React.createElement("span",{className:"track-duration",ref:container});};var mapsStateToProps=function mapsStateToProps(state,ownProps){return{trackDuration:state.console.channel[ownProps.name].track.duration};};export default connect(mapsStateToProps)(TrackDuration);
